intro_viewparty: Carlsberg Viewing Party is rolling out across multiple states for one epic day where great friends, good vibes, and unforgettable football moments come together. Catch the game live on the big screen, ice-cold Carlsberg, and groove to fantastic music — because game nights are always better when we're together.
event1-desc1:
Step into the buzzing vibes of our festive bazaar — packed with arts, creative crafts, fashion finds, and bites so good
you'll be wandering around like it's your new hobby.
event1-desc2:
Plus, level up the excitement with a chance to walk
home with exclusive prizes!

carls_event_cc1: CarlsCrib - a specially curated space with the best vibes where you and your mates come together for the best moments.
carls_event_cc2: Get ready for an epic celebration as Liverpool FC, the 2024-25 Premier League Champions, play their final match of the season!
carls_event_cc3: Experience the adrenaline rush with an electrifying entertainment line-up featuring DJ VINAI from Italy, Pakho Chau from Hong Kong, and homegrown talents Dior and DJ Nahsyk.
carls_event_cc4: Dive into an array of exciting games, engaging workshops, and delectable eats all lined up for you. You also stand a chance to snag some cool merch and win a trip for you and your mate to watch Liverpool FC live in Hong Kong!
landing_page_paragraph_1:
Where spicy excites, music ignites,
and Carlsberg smooths it all out.
Your smooth journey begins here –
every flavour, every beat, every toast –
made #BestWithCarlsberg.
landing_page_paragraph_2_desktop:
Get ready for the ultimate spicy food and Carlsberg Smooth Draught
pairing – a feast of flavours and chill vibes.
landing_page_paragraph_2_mobile:
Get ready for the ultimate spicy food and Carlsberg Smooth Draught
pairing – a feast of flavours and chill vibes.
landing_page_paragraph_3: Grab all 5 limited edition collectible speakers.
spicy_mix_store: Grab it from your nearest MiX Stores!
spicy_mix:
Experience the first-ever beer-cooked Self-Heating Steamboat, exclusively by MiX & Carlsberg Smooth Draught —
where smooth meets spicy.
spicy_page:
Get ready for the ultimate spicy food and Carlsberg Smooth Draught
pairing – a feast of flavours and chill vibes.
bazaar-desc1: Join us for an exciting Chinese New Year Bazaar filled with festive activities, traditional food, and amazing prizes!
bazaar-desc2: Experience the joy of the season with live performances, cultural displays, and special promotions.
